com.dao

Class ApplicationDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dao.ApplicationDao

  • public class ApplicationDao
extends java.lang.Object

    Application Dao

    This class implements all the methods to access the Hotels,Bookings and BookingDays Table in the Hotel Database
    Since:
    2019-01-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    https://github.com/e-business-app
